mapper.select: SELECT dmr.departmentId, d.departmentName, dmr.processId, sp.processName, dmr.entranceYear, dmr.mustMajor, dmr.choiceMajor, dmr.mustPlusChoice FROM department_major_rule dmr JOIN department d ON dmr.departmentId = d.id JOIN special_process sp ON dmr.processId = sp.id WHERE departmentId = #{departmentId} and (entranceYear = #{entranceYear} or entranceYear = 0);
select * from department_major_rule where departmentId=#{departmentId} and entranceYear=#{entranceYear} and processId = 1
select * from department_major_rule where departmentId=#{departmentId} and entranceYear=#{entranceYear} and processId = 2
select * from department_major_rule where departmentId=#{departmentId} and (entranceYear=#{entranceYear} or entranceYear=0) and processId=#{processId}
mapper.update: UPDATE department_major_rule SET mustMajor = #{mustMajor}, choiceMajor = #{choiceMajor}, mustPlusChoice = #{mustPlusChoice} WHERE departmentId = #{departmentId} and entranceYear=#{entranceYear} and processId = #{processId}

update.foreach: update department_major_rule set mustMajor=#{item.mustMajor}, choiceMajor=#{item.choiceMajor}, mustPlusChoice = #{item.mustPlusChoice} WHERE departmentId=#{item.departmentId} AND entranceYear=#{item.entranceYear} AND processId=#{item.processId}
